Chapter 1

The flames in the fireplace were nearly extinguished , the curtains drawn on the high windows of [[Elijah Crane]103-eli ’s office]309-elijah crane ’s office . Rain pattered on the glass , providing a soothing backdrop for [his]103-eli work . [He]103-eli pecked at [his]103-eli keyboard , [his]103-eli mind on the e - mail , when a mousy , quiet voice lifted in the darkness . “ [Mr. … Crane]104-reese ? ”[311-his newest temporary assistant] The desk lamp and a slice of natural light made its way past the doorless entry to [[his]103-eli office]310-his office . [[His]103-eli newest temporary assistant]311-his newest temporary assistant stood blocking that light , [her]311-his newest temporary assistant shadow a long , narrow wedge . “ [Reese Crane]104-reese called , ”[311-his newest temporary assistant] [she]311-his newest temporary assistant said as [she]311-his newest temporary assistant walked into [[his]103-eli office]310-his office . “ [[Your]103-eli brother]2479-your brother . ”[311-his newest temporary assistant] Like [he]103-eli needed that clarification ? “ [I]311-his newest temporary assistant know who [Reese Crane]104-reese is , [Melanie]105-melanie . ”[311-his newest temporary assistant] “ [He]104-reese asked [me]311-his newest temporary assistant to … ”[311-his newest temporary assistant] [Her]311-his newest temporary assistant small voice grew smaller until it vanished altogether . Reason being , [Eli]103-eli had taken a deep , rumbling breath and pushed [himself]103-eli up from the desk . Slowly . Let it never be said intimidation was n’t an art form . [He]103-eli kept [his]103-eli eyes on [the woman now standing at the other side of [his]103-eli desk]313-the woman now standing at the other side of his desk . [She]311-his newest temporary assistant was young , in [her]311-his newest temporary assistant early twenties , and from what [he]103-eli ’d gleaned in the last eight or so hours since [she]311-his newest temporary assistant ’d started this position , weak . [He]103-eli ’d bet [he]103-eli could run this one off in record time . Not that [he]103-eli was keeping track , but maybe [he]103-eli should . [He]103-eli was getting good at it . [He]103-eli blew out that same breath , keeping [his]103-eli lip curled , [his]103-eli expression hard . [He]103-eli let the breath end on a growl . “ What did [I]103-eli tell [you]311-his newest temporary assistant this morning ? ”[103-eli] [he]103-eli asked , [his]103-eli voice lethal . [[His]103-eli latest temporary personal assistant currently putting a massive cramp in [his]103-eli style]314-his latest temporary personal assistant currently putting a massive cramp in his style blinked [her]314-his latest temporary personal assistant currently putting a massive cramp in his style big , doelike eyes . “ Not to interrupt [you]103-eli , but , [Mr. Crane]104-reese — ”[314-his latest temporary personal assistant currently putting a massive cramp in his style] “ Not . To . Interrupt [me]103-eli . ”[103-eli] [He]103-eli made a show of pulling [his]103-eli shoulders straight and hobbling around the table . [Her]314-his latest temporary personal assistant currently putting a massive cramp in his style gaze trickled down to the prosthesis at the end of [his]103-eli right leg as [he]103-eli affected a limp . One [he]103-eli did n’t have . One [he]103-eli ’d trained [himself]103-eli not to have . [The help]315-the help found [him]103-eli more intimidating when reminded [he]103-eli was [an amputee]316-an amputee . [He]103-eli ’d used it to [his]103-eli advantage on more than one occasion . “ Do [I]103-eli look like [I]103-eli need to be bothered with trivial questions , [Melanie]105-melanie ? ”[103-eli] “ N - no , [sir]2480-sir , but it ’s about [Crane Hotels]6-crane hotels and [I]315-the help was hired to — ”[315-the help] “ [You]317-you answer to [me]103-eli , ”[103-eli] [he]103-eli told [her]317-you point - blank . “ [I]103-eli do n’t care if it ’s a memo from [the Pope]2481-the pope . [I]103-eli asked not to be interrupted . [I]103-eli expect not to be interrupted . ”[103-eli] “ But the board meeting … ”[105-melanie] [Melanie]105-melanie trailed off , [her]105-melanie eyes blinking faster as if staving off tears . Tough shit , [sweetheart]318-sweetheart . The sooner word reached [[his]103-eli brothers]319-his brothers that [the ninth]320-the ninth — or was [Melanie]105-melanie the tenth?—PA to set foot in [[Eli]103-eli ’s warehouse]321-eli ’s warehouse left in tears , the better . [He]103-eli was n’t interested in resuming a position with [Crane Hotels]6-crane hotels for a myriad of personal reasons , none of which [he]103-eli ’d shared with [them]319-his brothers . [The thickheaded men in [[his]103-eli family]323-his family]322-the thickheaded men in his family did n’t listen when [he]103-eli ’d clearly and concisely said no to a pencil - pushing position at [the Crane home base]324-the crane home base , so [he]103-eli ’d resorted to showing not telling . The more assistants [Reese]104-reese had sent , [the brasher Eli]325-the brasher eli had become . “ [Mr. Reese Crane]104-reese said all [you]103-eli need to do is read this report and give [your]103-eli opinion . [I]105-melanie can reiterate on the conference call for [you]103-eli , ”[105-melanie] [she]105-melanie squeaked . [Eli]103-eli elevated [his]103-eli chin and stared [her]105-melanie down . [She]105-melanie did n’t hold [his]103-eli gaze , [hers]105-melanie jerking left then right and very purposefully avoiding dipping to [his]103-eli missing limb for a second time . Sucking in a breath , [he]103-eli blew out one word . “ Fine . ”[103-eli] “ Fine ? ”[105-melanie] [Melanie]105-melanie ’s eyebrows lifted , [her]105-melanie expression infused with hope . [She]105-melanie was sweet … and about to get a lesson in hard knocks . [He]103-eli had n’t always been this rigid , but change was inevitable after what had happened . [She]105-melanie was about to be on the receiving end of [the not - so - nice guy [he]103-eli ’d become]326-the not - so - nice guy he ’d become . “ [You]105-melanie want [my]103-eli opinion ? [I]103-eli ’ll give [you]105-melanie [my]103-eli opinion . ”[103-eli] [He]103-eli lashed a hand around [her]105-melanie wrist , removed the folder from [her]105-melanie hand , and tossed it into the fireplace . There were mostly embers now , but a single flame crawled over the edge of the folder as it slid onto the concrete floor . The fire fizzled , smoking instead of igniting . Well . That was unimpressive . “ [You]103-eli … [you’re]103-eli … ”[105-melanie] [Melanie]105-melanie ’s fists were balled at [her]105-melanie sides , [her]105-melanie eyes filling yet again as [she]105-melanie visibly shook . “ Spit it out . [I]105-melanie do n’t have all day . ”[105-melanie] “ [You]103-eli ’re [a monster]2482-a monster ! ”[105-melanie] [She]105-melanie turned and ran — yes , ran — from [[his]103-eli office]310-his office , through [[his]103-eli dining room]328-his dining room and to [the warehouse elevator]329-the warehouse elevator . [He]103-eli stepped out from behind [[his]103-eli office]310-his office wall to watch the entire scene , arms folded over [his]103-eli chest . There were few doors and walls in [this place]331-this place , so not much hampered the sight of another victory won by [Eli “ Monster ”[103-eli] Crane]103-eli . Back in [[his]103-eli office]310-his office , [he]103-eli stomped on the smoking file folder at [his]103-eli feet . Once [he]103-eli was sure [he]103-eli would n’t burn down [[his]103-eli house]333-his house , [he]103-eli chucked the folder into the wastebasket at the side of [his]103-eli desk . “ Sorry , [Reese]104-reese , ”[103-eli] [he]103-eli said to thin air . “ [You]104-reese ’ll have to manage without [me]103-eli . ”[103-eli] [They]334-they ’d managed without [him]103-eli for the years [he]103-eli was stationed [overseas]335-overseas . [[His]103-eli brothers]319-his brothers could put one foot in front of the next without [him]103-eli . [God]107-god knew being away had n’t improved [Eli]103-eli ’s ability to weigh in on financials . But that ’s not why [they]334-they wanted [him]103-eli [there]337-there . [Reese]104-reese and [Tag]108-tag , and [[their]319-his brothers father]338-their father , wanted [Eli]103-eli there because [they]334-they believed [Crane Hotels]6-crane hotels was part of [Eli]103-eli ’s future . A legacy , like [CEO]339-ceo was for [Reese]104-reese . Like Guest and [Restaurant Services]340-restaurant services was for [Tag]108-tag . [Eli]103-eli ’s avoidance was in part because [he]103-eli had spearheaded a sizeable personal project and in larger part because wherever [he]103-eli went , unfortunate events unfurled . [He]103-eli was n’t quite ready to topple [the company [[his]103-eli father]342-his father had grown into an empire]341-the company his father had grown into an empire . [His]103-eli cell phone buzzed with a text from [an old friend [he]103-eli ’d contacted earlier this week]343-an old friend he ’d contacted earlier this week . [He]103-eli lifted the phone and walked smoothly from [his]103-eli desk to [the kitchen]344-the kitchen , reading the text . Yep , still in business . [He]103-eli tapped in a reply . Let ’s talk more next week . Give [me]0-i a choice of dates . [He]103-eli pocketed [his]103-eli phone , feeling a charge shoot down [his]103-eli arms . Since [he]103-eli ’d come [home]345-home , [he]103-eli ’d been consumed with giving back . With changing the worlds of [men]346-men and [women who ’d made sacrifices]347-women who ’d made sacrifices . For [[their]347-women who ’d made sacrifices country]348-their country , for [[their]347-women who ’d made sacrifices families]349-their families . [Men]346-men and [women who ’d returned [home]345-home with less than [they]351-women who ’d returned home with less than they had before they left and were expected to drop back into the flow of things had before [they]351-women who ’d returned home with less than they had before they left and were expected to drop back into the flow of things left and were expected to drop back into the flow of things]351-women who ’d returned home with less than they had before they left and were expected to drop back into the flow of things . Penance , [some]353-some might argue , for everything in [[Eli]103-eli ’s past]354-eli ’s past . [He]103-eli was n’t above admitting that evening the scales for [his]103-eli failures was a big part of what drove [his]103-eli actions now . Which meant [he]103-eli had no interest in stepping in as [chief operations officer of [the gargantuan Crane Hotels]356-the gargantuan crane hotels]355-chief operations officer of the gargantuan crane hotels , no matter how many PAs [[his]103-eli oldest brother]357-his oldest brother sent over . Keep ’em comin ’ . [Eli]103-eli had become adept at running off [PAs]109-pas . In fact , [he]103-eli ’d become even more creative about the ways [he]103-eli could get [them]109-pas to quit . If poor [Melanie]105-melanie had [her]105-melanie way , [he]103-eli ’d reside in [a creepy mansion atop [a hill]359-a hill]358-a creepy mansion atop a hill . [The gossip rags]360-the gossip rags would murmur about [the beastly Crane brother]361-the beastly crane brother [no one]362-no one dared bother lest [they]360-the gossip rags suffer [his]103-eli wrath . [He]103-eli let out a dry laugh , amused by the bend of [his]103-eli thoughts . After the year [he]103-eli ’d had , that sounded a lot like heaven .

* * *

The phone was ringing off the hook today , which normally would be a good sign . But [the caller on hold]363-the caller on hold sent [Isabella Sawyer]110-isabella ’s stomach on a one - way trip to [her]110-isabella toes . “ [Isa]111-isa ? ”[364-her assistant] [[her]110-isabella assistant]364-her assistant called again from [her]110-isabella desk . “ Do [you]111-isa want [me]364-her assistant to take a message ? ”[364-her assistant] “ No , [Chloe]112-chloe , [I]110-isabella ’ll take it . ”[110-isabella] [She]110-isabella did n’t want to take it , but [she]110-isabella ’d take it . [She]110-isabella shut [[her]110-isabella office]365-her office door and in the minimizing crack watched as [[her]110-isabella friend]366-her friend ’s face morphed into concern . [Isa]111-isa gave [Chloe]112-chloe a thumbs - up [she]110-isabella did n’t quite feel . Lifting the handset of [her]111-isa desk phone was like facing [a firing squad]367-a firing squad . “ [Bobbie]113-bobbie , hello , ”[111-isa] [she]111-isa said to [[Reese Crane]104-reese ’s secretary]368-reese crane ’s secretary . “ Hold for [Mr. Crane]104-reese , ”[113-bobbie] [Bobbie]113-bobbie clipped in [her]113-bobbie usual curt manner . [She]113-bobbie ’d had similar conversations with [Reese]104-reese several times already . Nine other times , to be exact . One for each of [the personal assistants [she]113-bobbie ’d sent over to work with [[his]104-reese brother]370-his brother]369-the personal assistants she ’d sent over to work with his brother . [Isa]111-isa was pretty sure this was the “ [you]2483-you ’re fired ”[104-reese] call [she]111-isa ’d been expecting [three assistants]371-three assistants ago . At least [she]111-isa had a prepared response this time . “ [Isa]111-isa . Here [we]2484-we are again , ”[104-reese] came [Reese]104-reese ’s smooth voice . [She]111-isa ’d met [him]104-reese once in passing , at an event [she]111-isa ’d attended on behalf of [[her]111-isa personal assistant company]372-her personal assistant company , [Sable Concierge]373-sable concierge . [Reese Crane]104-reese was tall , intimidating , handsome , and professional . And married . Not that [he]104-reese was [[Isa]111-isa ’s type]374-isa ’s type . [Business guys in suits for [clients]376-clients]375-business guys in suits for clients , yes . [Business guys in suits for dating potential]377-business guys in suits for dating potential , no thanks . [She]111-isa ’d been [there]337-there , done that , and picked up the dry cleaning . “ [Mr. Crane]104-reese , [I]111-isa ’m sorry [we]2485-we are n’t speaking under better circumstances . ”[111-isa] “ So am [I.]111-isa [You]104-reese promised [me]105-melanie [you]104-reese ’d found the ideal PA for [Eli]103-eli this time around . ”[105-melanie] [Melanie]105-melanie had n’t been second string , but [Isa]111-isa had already gone through [her]111-isa top choices . [Elijah Crane]103-eli had chased off every last one of [them]379-them . [They]380-they were down to [[her]111-isa assistant]364-her assistant [Chloe]112-chloe , whom [Isa]111-isa needed here in [the office]382-the office , or a new hire named [Joey]114-joey . No way would [he]103-eli last thirty seconds . [Isa]111-isa refused to pull [her]111-isa other PAs off current assignments to cater to [Elijah Crane]103-eli . If [she]111-isa lost the Crane business , [she]111-isa ’d need [[her]111-isa current roster of [clients]376-clients]383-her current roster of clients or [they]383-her current roster of clients ’d all starve . “ Solve [my]104-reese problem . ”[104-reese] [Reese]104-reese ’s commanding tone brooked no argument , nor should it . * * *

One of the first changes [Eli]103-eli had made once [he]103-eli could walk on [his]103-eli new carbon - fiber leg was to adapt [[his]103-eli car]967-his car so [he]103-eli could drive . Chapter 7

Chapter 9

Chapter 13

[Bing]205-bing ! Really ? [Eli]103-eli had been trying to review and make notes on the report [Reese]104-reese had sent [him]103-eli for the last hour , but [his]103-eli inbox chime had been working overtime . [Isabella]110-isabella was no longer sitting at [[his]103-eli dining room]328-his dining room table intercepting [his]103-eli messages for [him]103-eli . And the reason [she]110-isabella was n’t here intercepting [his]103-eli messages for [him]103-eli was because [he]103-eli ’d been nothing but impossible to deal with since [they]1606-they ’d met . Friday had been a turning point for [her]110-isabella . [He]103-eli did n’t blame [her]110-isabella for bailing . [He]103-eli did n’t know if [he]103-eli would ’ve respected [her]110-isabella if [she]110-isabella ’d continued to take [his]103-eli shit without pushing back . [I]103-eli will have it to [you]104-reese as soon as possible . ”[103-eli] “ [You]103-eli sound chipper , ”[370-his brother] came [[his]103-eli brother]370-his brother ’s droll response . “ Yeah , well , [[my]370-his brother assistant]2641-my assistant has n’t showed up for four days , so [I]370-his brother ’m buried . ”[370-his brother] [Reese]104-reese could n’t see [him]103-eli , but [Eli]103-eli gestured to the pile that had collected on [his]103-eli desk anyway . “ Four days ? [Eli]103-eli did n’t speak . “ Because [[your]104-reese girlfriend]3006-your girlfriend told [me]103-eli . ”[103-eli] “ [I]103-eli was there . ”[103-eli] [Eli]103-eli huffed like a perturbed lion . “ [You]104-reese have [my]103-eli full support , [Eli]103-eli . [You]104-reese should have told [me]103-eli about [the charity]749-the charity sooner . ”[103-eli] Guilt stabbed [his]103-eli diaphragm . This kind of guilt , [he]103-eli was n’t as familiar with . [[His]103-eli brothers]319-his brothers and [father]443-father had been relying on [him]103-eli and [he]103-eli ’d proven [himself]103-eli borderline disloyal by keeping secrets . And yet [they]1611-they accepted [him]103-eli . [Eli]103-eli never should have expected less . In this case , that meant [she]111-isa needed to put [her]111-isa needs before [Eli]103-eli ’s . [Chloe]112-chloe had a date tonight , so [she]112-chloe ’d already gone [home]345-home . Chapter 20

[Rhona]123-rhona laughed . “ That ’s the one [you]3217-you three trust with [your]3217-you three heart , ”[122-alex] [Alex]122-alex said . “ Even if it means getting hurt again . Chapter 21

For the entire next week , [Isa]111-isa ’s MO had been work , followed by more work .
